wrongFullText:
Emmy Award winner Holland Taylor will star as Ann Richards in the new solo show Ann, to debut at Paramount Theatre in Austin, May 4-7, 2011.

This bio-play about the former Texas governor, who died in 2006, is billed as “an affectionate portrait.”

Taylor won an Emmy for her role as Judge Roberta Kittelson in ABC’s The Practice,and is also well known for her television roles on Bosom Buddies and Two and a Half Men, among others. Her stage credits include the Broadway productions of The Devils, Butley, and Moose Murders, and starred last year in the Off-Broadway play, Mother.

For more information, click here.
